Comment.Language: Non-customary concluding canon for Sundays during the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Afjoust n~je Vnou] pina/t: qen oubal efoi n~na/t: nem hannai nem hanmetsenh/t: e~bolqen tefve e~pec/t.
God the merciful looked with a merciful eye in mercies and compassions from His heaven down [to earth].

He saved us from straying and darkness by the incarnation of His Logos, His only-begotten Son from the holy Virgin Mary.
